file_content.text: We'll hide in the workshop until all the shooting ends. Guess we might be a while, huh?
No blasters! We got no blasters! It's just a workshop. We're not with those Justicar crazies you been fightin' out there.
Cooperate and you won't be harmed. Where's the Gree device?
Surrender, please.
I want the Gree device.
Oh, great. I told you guys we should've left that alien thing where it belonged!
I want the Gree device, and I will kill you if I don't get it.
Talk or you're dead.
Take it easy! The last thing we want is to get killed over some useless tech.
Take it, all right? We thought we could make it work, but we can't. We'll have to find some other way to save everyone on this level.
Are the people on this level in some kind of danger?
What do you mean?
Yes. We're not thieves, we're engineers. We work to keep this area clean and safe, but it's gettin' harder every day to do that.
You, save everyone? Don't make me laugh.
You've got to be joking.
Laugh all you want. People here count on us for essential services. We give them power and light.
Still waiting for my device.
The Gree stuff is all yours, don't worry. We never woulda taken it if we weren't in such a hopeless situation.
This level's got a big problem we can't fix. The air filters stopped working.
The Senate won't send anybody to make repairs, and things are gettin' bad. We got too many people living in the same area.
This is Coruscant. Why wouldn't the Senate help with repairs?
The Senate won't help?
They don't bother keepin' any of our major systems running. Why should they, when the Justicars won't let 'em in?
It sounds like it's time to find a new home.
Couldn't you move away?
Coruscant's always been our home. We're all here because we believe in the Republic. Can't you understand that?
I'd say it's time for some aggressive depopulation.
So thin the herds.
Are you saying we should go out and kill every third refugee just to make room? Are you space-happy?
Without our air filters, the smog seeps in fast, which is even harder on the non-humanoids. Pretty soon we're gonna have an epidemic on our hands.
There must be some way to avoid that outcome.
What can be done?
That's what we keep tellin' ourselves, but so far we've come up empty.
Fear unbalances you and makes a bad situation worse.
Calm yourself. Focus.
It's hard to imagine things gettin' much worse than they already are, but that's exactly where things are headed.
Don't worry about the odds so much.
Maybe, maybe not.
Look, it's not a question of "if," it's a question of "when"!
Regardless of your reasons, you stole Republic property.
That doesn't excuse you.
We're not makin' any excuses. We got carried away and we're sorry. But we gotta do somethin'!
Don't look at me.
I don't know. You're workin' with those Gree, right? Maybe you can put in a word?
Get over it.
Please, the people down here have families. We have to do something.
If we get our air filters workin', you'll never hear from us again.
I know I'm askin' a lot, but will you tell the Gree about us? Maybe ask them to show us how to fix things up? Please?
I'll tell the Gree representatives about your situation.
Yes, I'll help you.
You don't know what this means to us. You're savin' innocent lives.
Here, this datapad's got stuff about us the Gree will wanna know. Schematics of what we're workin' on, our repair manuals, all that stuff.
Just show it to them. It'll explain everything about our situation.
Just give me the device before I kill you all.
I'm not your buddy.
All right, all right! Take the Gree tech. Take it! We'll just start suffocating down here.
My friends and I are just workin' hard, all right? We don't want any trouble, especially not with you.
